scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run build.angular && cd ./demo-ng && ns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.ng.android.dev: npm run build.angular && cd ./demo-ng && ns run android --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run build.angular && cd ./demo-ng && ns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.ng.ios.dev: npm run build.angular && cd ./demo-ng && ns run ios --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.react.android: npm run build && cd ./demo-react && ns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.react.android.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-react && ns run android --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.react.ios: npm run build && cd ./demo-react && ns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.react.ios.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-react && ns run ios --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.svelte.android: npm run build && cd ./demo-svelte && ns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.svelte.android.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-svelte && ns run android --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.svelte.ios: npm run build && cd ./demo-svelte && ns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.svelte.ios.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-svelte && ns run ios --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm run build && cd ./demo-vue && ns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.vue.android.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-vue && ns run android --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm run build && cd ./demo-vue && ns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.vue.ios.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-vue && ns run ios --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.publish: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run build.angular && lerna publish --create-release=github --force-publish
